  • Constructor Details

    • TruckTest

      public TruckTest()
      Constructeur de la classe-test TruckTest

  • Method Details

    • testLoad

      @Test @DisplayName("load(Shipment)") public void testLoad()
      Tests the Truck.load(Shipment) method. Loads shipments into a Truck, then ensures that all shipments were loaded correctly. Also verifies that TruckFullException is thrown for any load that would go over the space constraints of the truck.

    • testUnload

      @Test @DisplayName("unload()") public void testUnload()
      Tests the Truck.unload() method. Unloads shipments from a truck, ensuring that the correct shipments are unloaded. Also verifies that TruckEmptyException is thrown when trying to unload an empty truck.

    • testSetDestination

      @Test @DisplayName("setDestination()") public void testSetDestination()
      Tests the Truck.setDestination() method. Sets up four scenarios, one where pickup is closer, one where dropoff is closer, and two where both are equidistant. Ensures that the destination of the truck is set accurately.

    • testMove

      @Test @DisplayName("move()") public void testMove()
      Tests the Truck.move() method. Using four different scenarios with varying expected outcomes, test that a truck always moves toward its destination, doesn't overshoot its destination, and takes the fastest route to the destination.

    • testAction

      @Test @DisplayName("action()") public void testAction()
      Tests the Truck.action() method. Uses a sample scenario over two simulation hours where a truck arrives at the warehouse, then joins the queue.
